translation.en: Lookie here.
My day is made. [laughs]
I didn't even finish breakfast and I get to kill me a stinkin' Injun.
translation.it: Non ho neanche finito la colazione e posso già uccidere un lurido indiano.

translation.en: Injun?
I just dress like this so's I don't get scalped out on the prairie.
translation.it: Mi sono vestito così per non essere scotennato nella prateria.

translation.en: Oh, well, that's a convincing outfit.
Yeah, you can't be too safe out there...
translation.it: Già, non si è mai troppo al sicuro...

translation.en: with all of them savages runnin' around.
So, what can I do you for?
translation.it: Allora, che posso fare per voi?

translation.en: Need some flour. Five sacks.
translation.it: Mi serve della farina. Cinque sacchi.

translation.en: And a carrot with peanut butter on it.
translation.it: E una carota con del burro di noccioline.

translation.en: Now, what's that gonna run me?
Well, sack of flour's 45 cents.
translation.it: Un sacco di farina costa 45 centesimi.

translation.en: So, five sacks...
Wanna get back to me on that?
Yeah, look...
Now, the flour's in the basement.
You can fetch it yourself.
Much obliged.
Well, lookie what we got here.
translation.it: Guardate un po' cosa abbiamo qui.

translation.en: Sweet piece of red prairie meat out all by her lonesome.
translation.it: Dell'ottima carne rossa della prateria tutta sola e indifesa.

translation.en: -What do you make of that, Nelly? -Oh, I think she's waiting on you, Will.
translation.it: - Che ne pensi, Nelly? - Penso che stia aspettando te, Will.

translation.en: [Nelly Patch] Go on, get on it. [man 1] It's on now.
translation.it: - Datti da fare. - È tutta tua.

translation.en: [man 2] Yeah. [Nelly Patch] Go get her, Will.
[Nelly Patch] Here we go.
Now, you must be wondering why five badass hombres with perfect jawlines...
translation.it: Ti starai chiedendo perché cinque hombres tosti e attraenti...

translation.en: all sport the same stylish eye patch.
Not my business.
[laughs] We all carved our eyeballs out our skull
translation.it: Ci siamo tutti cavati l'occhio destro

translation.en: to show how devoted we are to this gang.
translation.it: per mostrare la nostra devozione a questa banda.

translation.en: We the Left-Eye Boys!
You got real pretty eyes, miss.
You reckon we can, I don't know, borrow one?
translation.it: Pensi che potremmo averne uno in prestito?

translation.en: -[screaming] -Can we borrow one?
Now, is that a proper question to ask a lady?
translation.it: Vi sembra una domanda appropriata da fare a una signora?

translation.en: Who are you, slick? The boyfriend?
translation.it: E tu chi sei, furbone? Il suo ragazzo?

translation.en: Soon to be the husband.
Oh, wait a minute! That's a white boy under that getup.
translation.it: Un momento! È un bianco vestito da indiano.

translation.en: That's a white boy? Oh, shit.
You partial to pale faces, Poca-hot-tits?
translation.it: Hai un debole per i visi pallidi, Poca-gnoccas?

translation.en: 'Cause I can show you what a real white man's like.
translation.it: Se è così, posso farti vedere com'è un vero uomo bianco.

translation.en: -Yeah, show her, Will. Yeah, go on. -Yeah, shuffle up, Will.
translation.it: - Sì, faglielo vedere, Will. Dai. - Sì, muoviti, Will.

translation.en: -Dance now, boy. -Shuffle on over.
-There you go. -That's some white boy shit right there.
translation.it: - Vai così. - È proprio roba da bianchi.

translation.en: Now, I do want to carve my eyes out.
translation.it: Ora sì che voglio cavarmi un occhio.

translation.en: -What'd you say? -Hey, fellers...
I'd hit the trail before you get hurt.
translation.it: vi consiglio di andarvene prima che vi facciate male.

translation.en: [snickering] Before we get hurt?
-Before we get hurt. -[laughing]
I think you've been smokin' too much of that peace pipe, kemo-slobby.
translation.it: Ti sei fumato troppo calumè della pace, scimunito.

translation.en: -[Left-Eye Boys laughing] -Now, from what I see, there's one of you,
translation.it: Da quanto vedo, tu sei solo

translation.en: and there's five of us.
Four of you.
What just happened?
You wanna see it again?
-I don't like this shit. -Shut up.
Well, that's some, uh... real fancy footwork.
translation.it: Davvero un bel gioco di piedi.

translation.en: But I think this hullabaloo has escalated to the firearms stage.
translation.it: Ma penso che ora questa faccenda vada risolta con le armi.

translation.en: Boys, let's ventilate this.
What the shit that just happened?
[weakly] What the hell? What in the hell?
"Hit the trail." It was so simple.
translation.it: "Vi consiglio di andarvene." Era così semplice.

translation.en: You must stop doing this, White Knife. One day, there will be too many.
translation.it: Devi smetterla, Lama Bianca. Prima o poi saranno in troppi.

translation.en: But not today, Smoking Fox.
translation.it: Ma non oggi, Gatta in Amore.

translation.en: Please, my love... we must go.
[shouting] What the hell happened out here?
translation.it: Che diavolo è successo qua fuori?

translation.en: Injuns. They went that way.
translation.it: Indiani. Sono andati da quella parte.

translation.en: You ain't no white man.
You're that orphan, White Knife.
Raised like an animal with those Apaches.
translation.it: Cresciuto come un animale con gli Apache.

translation.en: [scoffs] You think you can fool ol' Clem?
translation.it: Pensi di poter fregare il vecchio Clem?

translation.en: Sorry, Ringo.
Well, now I'm gonna shoot you and your Injun whore.
translation.it: Sparerò a te a alla tua puttana indiana.

translation.en: Gotta cut breakfast short.
You suck, mister!
What are you?
[child] Yes, White Knife.
Go, White Knife.
You lucky, Smoking Fox.
White Knife all man. Bravest of all braves.
translation.it: Lama Bianca è vero uomo. Più coraggioso di tutti.

translation.en: Not brave. Foolish.
I want to be wife, not widow.
Afternoon, ladies.
This is Apache land.
I'm not here to take your land, Chief.
translation.it: Non sono qui per prendervi la terra, Capo.

translation.en: I'm just looking for a particular boy.
translation.it: Sto cercando un ragazzo in particolare.

translation.en: I'm Frank Stockburn.
This boy's mother was my wife.
translation.it: La madre del ragazzo era mia moglie.

translation.en: And the boy, Tommy...
he's my son.
It is wise to be slow to trust, White Knife.
translation.it: È saggio non concedere fiducia facilmente.

translation.en: But every new journey begins with a single step.
translation.it: Ma ogni viaggio inizia con un primo passo.

translation.en: Speak with your father.
But you are my father, Screaming Eagle.
translation.it: Ma sei tu mio padre, Aquila Urlante.

translation.en: Ever since my mother...
Ever since you found me...
you taught me to hunt, to fight...
translation.it: mi hai insegnato a cacciare, a combattere,

translation.en: when to speak and when to be silent.
translation.it: a sapere quando parlare o stare zitto.

translation.en: -To be a man. -A good man.
translation.it: - A essere un uomo. - Un brav'uomo.

translation.en: And this Frank Stockburn,
he is filled with lies, just like every other white man.
translation.it: racconta un sacco di menzogne, come tutti i bianchi.

translation.en: Sometimes, the white man speaks the truth.
translation.it: A volte l'uomo bianco dice la verità.

translation.en: Like, one in 20, 25 times.
translation.it: Tipo una volta ogni 20 o 25 volte.

translation.en: I believe this is one of those times.
translation.it: Credo che questa sia una di quelle.

translation.en: He knew your mother, White Knife.
Maybe he can give you some peace. Talk to him.
translation.it: Forse può darti un po' di pace. Parla con lui.

translation.en: Maybe after I close my eyes to dream.
translation.it: Forse, prima voglio chiudere gli occhi e sognare.

translation.en: Mommy!
One look at me, and you knew your old man had done a lot of bad things, didn't ya?
translation.it: Appena mi hai visto, hai capito che ho fatto molte cose brutte, vero?

translation.en: I cheated men, I killed men...
So I deserve whatever's comin' to me.
The only one that ever saw any good in me was your mother.
translation.it: L'unica che riusciva a vedere del buono in me era tua madre.

translation.en: Why have you come here?
Not a man for chitchat, huh? [chuckles]
translation.it: Non ti piacciono i convenevoli, eh?

translation.en: Well, me neither.
Kid, I'm dying...
of consumption.
Don't worry...
I'm not looking for no big father-son hoo-ah.
translation.it: non sto cercando il conforto di un figlio.

translation.en: "I love you, son." [imitates child's voice] "I love you too, Daddy."
I've come for a more tangible reason.
translation.it: Sono venuto qui per una ragione più tangibile.

translation.en: Tommy, I've been stealing from folks since I was nine years old...
translation.it: Tommy, ho iniziato a rubare a nove anni

translation.en: and that's the way I've amassed a good little fortune.
translation.it: e così ho accumulato un bel gruzzolo.

translation.en: [sighs] I wanna do something decent with it.
I want to give it to you, son.
I don't want your money.
But maybe you could give...
$50,000 to these nice Injuns who raised you.
translation.it: Ma forse potresti dare 50.000 dollari a questi bravi indiani che ti hanno allevato.

translation.en: We'll take it.
Go back to bed.
Sorry.
Seriously, though, we'll take it.
translation.it: Ma dico sul serio, li accettiamo.

translation.en: Look, it's buried in the meadow just up the trail,
translation.it: Sono seppelliti in un prato lungo il sentiero,

translation.en: next to a big ol' pine tree.
translation.it: accanto a un vecchio, grosso pino.

translation.en: What do you say we go dig it up in the morning
translation.it: Che ne diresti di andare a disseppellirli in mattinata

translation.en: and start playing Santa Claus?
translation.it: e di giocare a Babbo Natale?

translation.en: I don't remember much about my mother...
translation.it: Non ricordo molte cose di mia madre,

translation.en: but I do remember her telling me...
translation.it: ma ricordo che mi aveva detto...

translation.en: you were dead.
Maybe it was because...
she didn't want you to come looking for me.
translation.it: ...non voleva che tu venissi a cercarmi.

translation.en: She was a smart lady.
Only stupid thing she ever did was fall for me.
translation.it: La sola cosa stupida che abbia mai fatto è stata quella di innamorarsi di me.

translation.en: Meeting Betty Dunson...
was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.it: ...è stata la mia fortuna più grande.

translation.en: From the first day I laid eyes on her...
translation.it: Dal momento stesso in cui misi gli occhi su di lei.

translation.en: she was bawlin' out this...
half-drunk, big ol' burly blacksmith...
translation.it: contro un vecchio e grosso fabbro, mezzo ubriaco...

translation.en: down at Silver Canyon.
She's been the only one, Tommy.
Mom had a temper?
[chuckling] Temper? When she got her dander up, look out.
translation.it: Irascibile? Se si infuriava, bisognava stare attenti.

translation.en: We was in a saloon once.
translation.it: Una volta eravamo in un saloon.

translation.en: This fellow sitting next to her
starts talking about the perfect way to make a cherry pie...
translation.it: iniziò a parlare della ricetta perfetta per la torta di ciliegie...

translation.en: So your mom says to me, "Frank, come here a minute.
translation.it: Allora tua madre mi disse: "Frank, vieni un attimo qui.

translation.en: Tell me again, just where did you get them flowers?"
translation.it: Ridimmi dove hai preso questi fiori?"

translation.en: I said, "I know that you think I stole them from the graveyard."
translation.it: E io: "So che pensi che li abbia rubati al cimitero".

translation.en: Good morning, boys.
Morning, Never Wears Bra.
I had dream about you last night, White Knife.
translation.it: Notte scorsa io sognato te, Lama Bianca.

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
Not nice dream.
In dream, you naughty.
You naughty, White Knife.
Mmm, somebody's got an admirer.
But like you, there's only one woman for me.
translation.it: Ma per me esiste solo una donna, come per voi.

translation.en: I guess we Stockburns are... partial to the sweet ones.
translation.it: Direi che a noi Stockburn piacciono le donne dolci.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Like your mother.
How did she die, Tommy?
You tell me?
Well, there were these big kids at school fixin' to beat me up.
translation.it: C'erano dei ragazzi grandi a scuola che volevano picchiarmi.

translation.en: Instead of facing them myself, I had her walk me there.
translation.it: Invece di affrontarli da solo, mi feci accompagnare da lei.

translation.en: This feller comes out of nowhere...
walks right up to her and shoots her dead.
translation.it: si avvicinò a lei e le sparò.

translation.en: So that's how she died, protecting her gutless son
translation.it: È morta così, cercando di proteggere il proprio figlio codardo,

translation.en: instead of being home, safe where she belonged.
translation.it: invece di starsene a casa, al sicuro, dove doveva essere.

translation.en: Who's that? Is that Bony Express?
translation.it: Chi sono? Quelli del Bony Express?

translation.en: [Tommy] Bony Express don't come around here.
translation.it: Il Bony Express non arriva da queste parti.

translation.en: He's here somewhere, boys.
Let's burn him out!
Next one goes through your forehead.
translation.it: Il prossimo te lo ficco in fronte.

translation.en: Hey, hey! No need to burn nothing, boys!
Howdy, boss.
Cicero...
you're not gonna let a man enjoy his retirement, are ya?
translation.it: perché non mi lasci godere la pensione?

translation.en: No, Frank, I salute your decision to turn from your sinful ways.
translation.it: Frank, rispetto la tua decisione di allontanarti da una vita peccaminosa.

translation.en: But the money... that belongs to all of us.
translation.it: Ma i soldi appartengono a tutti noi.

translation.en: Touch that steel, boy,
I got plenty of bullets left over after I put one in...
translation.it: mi avanzeranno un sacco di pallottole dopo averne usata una...

translation.en: your father.
Oh, you finally found your long lost son.
translation.it: Finalmente hai trovato il tuo figlio perduto.

translation.en: Well, I sure hate to break up this nice family reunion.
translation.it: Mi spiace interrompere questa bella riunione di famiglia.

translation.en: So, why don't you give us the money you stole
translation.it: Quindi perché non ci dai il denaro che hai rubato

translation.en: before I put lead in your head.
translation.it: prima che ti riempia la testa di piombo?

translation.en: The money's buried.
Way to run your mouth, son.
It's buried?
Yeah, I buried it.
Deep in the ground... next to a windmill.
translation.it: In profondità, accanto a un mulino a vento.

translation.en: A windmill in the West... doesn't narrow it down much, Frank.
translation.it: Un mulino a vento nel West non è un'indicazione molto precisa, Frank.

translation.en: Well, this is a special windmill.
translation.it: Beh, questo è un mulino speciale.

translation.en: It's a singing windmill.
[Cicero] A singing windmill!
It's about a ten-day ride from here.
translation.it: È a circa dieci giorni da qui.

translation.en: I'll lead you to it presently on one condition.
translation.it: Vi condurrò personalmente, ma a una condizione:

translation.en: You don't hurt my boy...
translation.it: che non facciate del male a mio figlio

translation.en: or any of these kindly Injuns here.
translation.it: o ai gentili indiani di questa tribù.

translation.en: Let's ride, Frank.
Frank, if that $50,000 isn't under that windmill,
translation.it: Frank, se i 50.000 dollari non sono sotto quel mulino,

translation.en: I'm gonna bury you up to your neck
and let the desert critters eat you alive.
translation.it: e ti farò mangiare vivo dagli animali del deserto.

translation.en: It's there, Cicero, it's there.
I'm glad I got to meet Betty Dunson's son.
translation.it: Sono contento di aver conosciuto il figlio di Betty Dunson.

translation.en: You just stay here, Tommy.
Enjoy your life with your beautiful bride...
translation.it: Goditi la vita con la tua bellissima moglie...

translation.en: amongst these majestic pine trees.
Let's go!
Well, that was uncool.
White Knife, you must rest.
How can I rest?
When they get to the singing windmill and find no money, they will kill him.
translation.it: Quando arriveranno al mulino e non troveranno i soldi, lo uccideranno.

translation.en: My son, there are too many trees and too little time.
translation.it: Ci sono troppi alberi e troppo poco tempo.

translation.en: Then I must get this $50,000 another way.
translation.it: Allora devo procurarmi 50.000 dollari in un altro modo.

translation.en: How? By stealing? There is no honor in that.
Unless I steal from those who have no honor.
translation.it: A meno che non li rubi a chi è senza onore.

translation.en: Ooh... I like that.
But it is too dangerous.
I will send ten of our strongest braves with you.
translation.it: Ti farò accompagnare da dieci uomini valorosi.

translation.en: The braves would be treated too cruelly in the white man's world.
translation.it: Sarebbero trattatati con troppa crudeltà nel mondo dei bianchi.

translation.en: A lot of them can pass for pale face.
translation.it: Molti potrebbero essere scambiati per visi pallidi.

translation.en: Raging Bear can actually do a great impression of a white guy.
translation.it: Orso Furente sa imitare benissimo l'uomo bianco.

translation.en: Hey, guys, let's play with our chest hair and eat potato chips.
translation.it: Ehi, giochiamo con i nostri peli sul petto e mangiamo le patatine.

translation.en: Wasn't that great? Where does he come up with this stuff?
translation.it: Non è fantastico? Dove avrà imparato questa roba?

translation.en: That's very good, Bear, but I must walk this path alone.
translation.it: Bravissimo, Orso, ma devo affrontare questo cammino da solo.

translation.en: My love... I will get this money... bring it to the singing windmill,
translation.it: Amore mio, troverò il denaro, lo porterò al mulino che canta

translation.en: and be back in time for our wedding.
translation.it: e tornerò in tempo per il nostro matrimonio.

translation.en: I won't let you go.
Those men are killers.
I was a coward once and my mother paid the price.
translation.it: Una volta sono stato un codardo e mia madre ne ha pagato le conseguenze.

translation.en: That will not happen to my father.
translation.it: Non lascerò che accada la stessa cosa a mio padre.

translation.en: -[horse neighs] -Good morning.
Where in the hell did you come from?
I'm in a bit of a bind, boys.
I rode all the way out here to pan for gold
translation.it: Ho viaggiato fin qui in cerca di oro

translation.en: and my horse up and died on me.
translation.it: e il mio cavallo è morto d'improvviso.

translation.en: How'd he die?
Suicide.
Drowned himself.
Put his head in the stream and just kept it there.
translation.it: Ha messo la testa nel ruscello e l'ha tenuta giù.

translation.en: Saddest thing you ever seen.
It happens.
Powers that be don't like to admit it, but it happens.
translation.it: Le autorità non vogliono ammetterlo, ma capita.

translation.en: He looks like an honest white guy.
Hop on.
Much obliged.
[Tommy] Just drop me off at the nearest town.
[man] Ladies and gentlemen, gather around.
Hear the wondrous effects of Dr. Chubb's Vita Oil,
translation.it: Udite gli effetti sorprendenti di Vita Oil del dottor Chubb,

translation.en: the miracle cure for 1001 ailments.
Put the pep back in your--
Who's this asshole?
Well, now, look at this fella, drinking from the horse trough.
translation.it: Guarda quel tizio, beve dall'abbeveratoio per cavalli.

translation.en: Excuse me.
You there!
What you're doing is disgusting.
translation.it: Ciò che state facendo è disgustoso.

translation.en: That water is for our filthy horses.
translation.it: Quell'acqua è per i nostri luridi cavalli.

translation.en: Water flows from the sky spirit for all its children.
translation.it: L'acqua scorre dallo spirito del cielo per tutti i suoi figli.

translation.en: Isn't that right, cousin?
We don't cotton to that peyote-smoking nonsense around these parts.
translation.it: Non tolleriamo i vaneggiamenti dei fumatori di peyote, da queste parti.

translation.en: Do you hear me, "cousin"?
[chuckling] Okay, William, come on back.
Hey, amigo.
You planning on staying in town?
translation.it: Avete intenzione di stare in città?

translation.en: Might need a place to lay my head for a bit.
translation.it: Potrebbe servirmi un posto per riposarmi un po'.

translation.en: Sorry about that ugly man that insulted you.
translation.it: Mi dispiace che quell'uomo sgradevole vi abbia insultato.

translation.en: He runs the bank, so he thinks he's entitled to be mean to everyone.
translation.it: Dirige la banca, quindi pensa di avere il diritto di trattare tutti male.

translation.en: There's a bank in this town?
translation.it: C'è una banca in questa città?

translation.en: Why? You wanna rob it?
I look like a bank robber to you, ma'am?
translation.it: Vi sembro un rapinatore di banche, signora?

translation.en: Funny, there's something about you that reminds me of a certain bank robber.
translation.it: Strano, c'è qualcosa in voi che mi ricorda un rapinatore di banche.

translation.en: His name was Frank Stockburn.
You know Frank Stockburn?
"Know"? Like, in the biblical sense?
No, ma'am. You've met him before is what I'm asking.
translation.it: No. Vi sto chiedendo se l'avete mai incontrato di persona.

translation.en: Yes, I met him.
Then, 20 minutes later,
I knew him in the biblical sense on that bed, right there.
translation.it: l'ho anche conosciuto in senso biblico proprio in quel letto.

translation.en: And, I knew him, in the biblical sense, twice on this railing.
translation.it: E l'ho conosciuto due volte, in senso biblico, su questa balaustra.

translation.en: And then, while doing a handstand on that dresser you're leaning against.
translation.it: E poi mentre facevo la verticale sul cassettone su cui siete appoggiato.

translation.en: Did he happen to mention a singing windmill?
translation.it: Ha mai parlato di un mulino a vento che canta?

translation.en: He did mention a singing windmill.
translation.it: Ha parlato di un mulino che canta.

translation.en: He said it sounded like a choir of angels.
translation.it: Diceva che sembrava un coro di angeli.

translation.en: Where'd he say it was?
He said that it was in a place where he made his biggest score.
translation.it: Diceva che era dove aveva fatto il suo colpo più importante.

translation.en: Whatever that was.
And then he laughed.
He liked to laugh...
and have handstand sex.
Yeah, we gotta get past that.
I miss him.
But he did leave me something to remember him by.
translation.it: Ma mi ha lasciato un bel ricordo.

translation.en: What's this?
A niño, Ramon.
I have a brother?
Oh, Burro, we had many adventures together, you and me.
translation.it: Ciuco, ne abbiamo passate tante insieme.

translation.en: We're not getting any younger.
At least we have our memories.
Remember the two girls, the sisters, in Deadwood?
translation.it: Ricordi le due ragazze, le sorelle, a Deadwood?

translation.en: You liked the fat one.
You know it's true.
[Tommy] Ramon Lopez?
I just came from conversating with your mother, Esmerelda.
translation.it: Ho fatto una chiacchierata con tua madre, Esmerelda.

translation.en: We stumbled upon the fact that your dad and my dad...
translation.it: È venuto fuori casualmente che tuo padre e il mio...

translation.en: are the same fella.
Oh, that's neat.
Same father.
Half-brothers.
What do you think about that, Burro?
So, how is Dad?
Well, he went and got himself kidnapped,
translation.it: Si è fatto prendere in ostaggio

translation.en: and I need to come up with $50,000 to save his life.
translation.it: e ho bisogno di 50.000 dollari per salvargli la vita.

translation.en: That's a lot of pesos.
translation.it: Sono un bel mucchio di pesos.

translation.en: Sure is.
That's why I'm fixin' to rob the bank here in town.
translation.it: Per questo ho intenzione di rapinare la banca di questa città.

translation.en: Hang on.
My father is in trouble.
My brother, he needs my help.
translation.it: Mio fratello ha bisogno del mio aiuto.

translation.en: I'll rob the bank with you.
translation.it: Rapinerò la banca insieme a te.

translation.en: I must do this alone.
What's happening right now?
Ever since I'm pequeño,
I dream about spending one magical day with mi padre,
translation.it: ho sognato di passare una giornata magica con mi padre,

translation.en: sharing meals, introducing him to the burro.
translation.it: di condividere il cibo con lui, di presentargli il mio ciuco.

translation.en: I will not let go of you until you say I can help you.
translation.it: Non ti lascerò andare finché non accetterai il mio aiuto.

translation.en: Will you stop brushing me if I say yes?
translation.it: La smetterai di spazzolarmi se ti dico di sì?

translation.en: Then you can help.
That means he likes you.
That's a good amount of money you want us to lend you.
translation.it: Ci chiedete in prestito una somma considerevole di denaro.

translation.en: Now, normally, we would require two forms of identification, madam,
translation.it: Di norma, avremmo bisogno di due documenti di identità,

translation.en: but that won't be necessary in your case.
translation.it: ma nel vostro caso non sarà necessario.

translation.en: -[woman sighs] -I feel kinda guilty about this, Burro, taking money from nice people.
translation.it: Mi sento un po' in colpa, Ciuco, a rubare soldi alla brava gente.

translation.en: I mean, it's not like you're some greasy Mexican.
translation.it: Del resto non siete una lercia messicana.

translation.en: I feel less guilty now.
translation.it: Ora mi sento meno in colpa.

translation.en: What are you doing?
This is a bank!
Get that donkey out of here!
It is a burro, señor.
I don't care, "señor." Get it out!
All right. Vámonos.
The burro don't want to vámonos.
Well, I don't really care what the burro wants.
translation.it: Non m'importa assolutamente cosa vuole il ciuco.

translation.en: Get out of my bank, you beast!
I know what you're thinking, but not yet.
translation.it: So a cosa stai pensando, ma non è ancora il momento.

translation.en: Hold it.
How is this jackass stuck?
If it got in here, it can certainly get out!
translation.it: Se è riuscito a entrare, potrà anche uscire!

translation.en: It doesn't make sense, it's not logical.
translation.it: Non ha senso, è illogico. CASSAFORTE T.L. WOODROW

translation.en: They got it locked up good, do they?
Oh! You are leaving!
Gall dang, he felled on his pooper!
translation.it: Cacchiarola, ha sbattuto sul suo didietro!

translation.en: -[bank manager] That makes no sense! -[Ramon stammering] I apologize.
-I don't know how many times I could-- -Hey, friend.
translation.it: - Non so quante volte... - Ehi, amico.

translation.en: Need any help gettin' her out?
translation.it: Serve una mano per farlo uscire?

translation.en: [quietly] She's not really stuck, amigo. She's just a diversion.
translation.it: Non è incastrato per davvero, amigo. È solo un diversivo.

translation.en: She's a virgin?
translation.it: Diverso? Nel senso che è vergine?

translation.en: I'm a virgin, too...
unless you count canty-loupes.
translation.it: ...a meno che non valgano anche i meloni.

translation.en: I believe that, but she's a diversion
translation.it: Ci credo, ma lui è un diversivo,

translation.en: to keep the banker busy
so that my brother has time to rob the bank.
translation.it: per permettere a mio fratello di derubare la banca.

translation.en: [stammers] You're robbin' the bank?
-Gall dang! -Shh, shh.
[whispers] Gall dang. Gall dang. Gall dang.
No! Virgil! Virgil, the key!
I'm Lil Pete.
So, is your father, like, Big Pete?
translation.it: E tuo padre chi è? Maxi Pete?

translation.en: I didn't know my pa.
But he was a bank robber like y'all! His name was Frank.
translation.it: Ma era un rapinatore di banche come voi! Si chiamava Frank.

translation.en: -Stockburn? -How'd you know?
Are you a wizard?
[Frank] Hey, Johnny Law.
We'll be waiting for you up at Jawbone Falls.
What?
Robbery!
We're being burgled!
You! Horse-water-drinker!
translation.it: Voi! Il bevitore di acqua per cavalli!

translation.en: You are caught, sir!
What are you?
Hey, Tommy, guess what? We got ourselves a little brother.
translation.it: Ehi, Tommy, indovina un po'? Abbiamo un fratellino.

translation.en: Yeah! All our moms got porked by the same outlaw.
translation.it: Già! Le nostre mamme si sono fatte fottere dallo stesso fuorilegge.

translation.en: -Ain't that a pip? -Yeah, that's something.
translation.it: - Non è forte? - Sì, è notevole.

translation.en: Hey! Those bandidos just robbed the bank!
translation.it: Ehi! Quei bandidos hanno appena rapinato la banca!

translation.en: Taste my bullets, you dirty foreigners!
translation.it: Assaggiate le mie pallottole, sporchi forestieri!

translation.en: Now!
-Nice one, Burro. -Wow!
-There they are! -[Ramon] We better make tracks.
Can I come with? I got a wagon.
All right, that ain't a bad idea, let's go.
translation.it: Ok, non è una cattiva idea, andiamo.

translation.en: [Ramon] Vámonos. Come on!
[Lil Pete] So, if you guys are my brothers, you must got three nipples, too.
translation.it: Se siete miei fratelli, anche voi dovreste avere tre capezzoli.

translation.en: [Ramon] I only got two.
[Tommy] Yeah, just got the two.
[Lil Pete] Oh, must be from my mama's side.
translation.it: L'avrò ereditato dalla famiglia di mia madre.

translation.en: Forget I tolded you that, okay?
[Tommy] Will do.
[Will Patch] Are you ready, Clem?
[Clem] Yep, yep. I'm... I'm ready.
Spoon.
Damn sharp.
Look, fellas, I wanna hunt this white Injun down same as you.
translation.it: Sentite, anch'io voglio dare la caccia a questo indiano bianco proprio come voi.

translation.en: But, uh... I...
I have some problems with my eyes.
You wanna join the Left-Eye Gang, that right eye has gotta come out.
translation.it: Se vuoi unirti alla Banda della benda, dovrai cavarti l'occhio destro.

translation.en: It'll only hurt for a second.
translation.it: Ti farà male solo per un secondo.

translation.en: Yeah, like a hundred seconds.
-Then you're one of us. -For life.
translation.it: Poi sarai uno di noi. Per sempre.

translation.en: Okay, that makes sense.
Is it okay if I scoop this left eye out?
translation.it: Va bene lo stesso se mi cavo l'occhio sinistro?

translation.en: This is... I'm basically blind here.
translation.it: A sinistra, non vedo quasi niente.

translation.en: This right one sees like an eagle.
translation.it: A destra, ho la vista di un'aquila.

translation.en: Yeah, it just seems like a waste that I'd...
I understand your predicament, but rules is rules.
translation.it: Capisco il tuo problema, ma le regole sono regole.

translation.en: Yeah, guess it... makes sense.
Oh, God!
-[Clem grunting] -[Gus Patch] Hell, no!
That ain't right!
-[grunts] -[Gus Patch] Damn!
[Will Patch] It's half way.
-It's dangling by a vein! -[Clem] Whoo! Oh, man!
translation.it: - È appeso a una vena! - Cavolo!

translation.en: It's crazy, I can still see out of it!
translation.it: È pazzesco, riesco ancora a vederci!

translation.en: -Goddamn, it hurts! -I think I'm gonna puke.
It's just going round and round like a tassel on a stripper's titty!
translation.it: Continua a ruotare come la nappa sulla tetta di una spogliarellista!

translation.en: Okay, gotta get it, gotta get it!
I'm getting dizzy!
Got it, got it, got it!
Oh, Lord! Holy shit.
You done it, partner. Welcome to the Left-Eye Gang.
translation.it: Ce l'hai fatta, socio. Benvenuto nella Banda della benda.

translation.en: I did it!
[laughing] I'm glad that's done.
Let's just go get that Injun-loving son of a bitch, huh?
translation.it: Andiamo a prendere quel figlio di puttana di indiano.

translation.en: -Yeah! Let's get him. -Yeah.
Like, so...
Oh, I touched the hole. I touched the hole!
Got me a patch! [chuckles]
[Lil Pete] Dear Mama, you may be wondering
why I have not returned from my trip to the ice cream store.
translation.it: perché non sono ancora tornato dalla gelateria.

translation.en: It's because I met my brothers, Ramon and Tommy.
translation.it: È perché ho conosciuto i miei fratelli, Ramon e Tommy.

translation.en: And we're trying to steal money.
translation.it: E stiamo cercando di rubare del denaro.

translation.en: We need the money to give to the bad men
translation.it: Ci serve per darlo agli uomini cattivi

translation.en: who took Pa away to the land of the singing windmill.
translation.it: che hanno portato papà nella terra del mulino che canta.

translation.en: Tommy says it's not okay to take money from decent folks.
translation.it: Tommy dice che non va bene rubare il denaro alle brave persone.

translation.en: I got the money!
Luckily, there's a lot of bad people here in the West.
translation.it: Per fortuna, c'è tanta gente cattiva nel West.

translation.en: Let's ride!
-[Ramon] Eat it! You know you like it. -[Lil Pete laughing] [Ramon] You know you like it.
translation.it: Ingoia! Lo sai che ti piace.

translation.en: Good God!
[laughing] Good burro!
[Ramon] That's right.
Enjoy it!
-That's just wrong. -Yeah, yeah.
translation.it: - Non si fanno queste cose. - Già.

translation.en: Is it?
This is so much better than the cantaloupe.
translation.it: È molto meglio che col melone.

translation.en: Good burro!
[Lil Pete] Slowly, but surely,
we're chippin' away at the $50,000 we need to save Pa.
translation.it: riusciremo ad arrivare ai 50.000 dollari che ci servono per salvare papà.

translation.en: That's a lot of money, isn't it, Mama?
Mama?
[laughs] Oh, yeah, that's right. I'm writing you a letter.
translation.it: Già, è vero. Ti sto scrivendo una lettera.

translation.en: Anyways, I can't wait to actually meet my pa.
translation.it: Comunque, non vedo l'ora di conoscere mio padre.

translation.en: I want him to teach me how you make babies.
translation.it: Voglio che m'insegni come si fanno i bambini.

translation.en: And how the lady poops 'em out.
translation.it: E come fanno le donne a espellerli.

translation.en: Be home quick as I can.
translation.it: Tornerò a casa il prima possibile.

translation.en: Your loving son, Lil Pete.
translation.it: Il tuo affezionato figlio, Mini Pete.

translation.en: Yeah, Lil Pete?
Where's the singing windmill?
It's where dad made his biggest score.
translation.it: È dove papà ha fatto il suo colpo più importante.

translation.en: Maybe we'll get another clue up at Jawbone Falls.
translation.it: Forse troveremo un altro indizio alle cascate Jawbone.

translation.en: That's where he used to hide out when he was an outlaw.
translation.it: È lì che si nascondeva quando era un fuorilegge.

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, cool beans.
Yeah, Lil Pete?
If we get caught stealing...
would we be in trouble?
I reckon we'll hang.
Well... that's no bother.
I got a real strong neck.
Mama makes me pull the plow with my head if I don't finish my schoolwork.
translation.it: La mamma mi fa tirare l'aratro con la testa, se non finisco i compiti.

translation.en: [chuckling] Which occurs regularilly.
Strong neck might come in handy.
translation.it: Un collo forte è sempre utile.

translation.en: Okay, let's get our rest.
Good night, Tommy.
Good night, Lil Pete.
[Lil Pete] Good night, Ramon.
[Ramon] Good night, brothers.
Good night, Burro.
[Ramon] That's a dry one.
We will have good dry weather tomorrow.
[Lil Pete] Shoo, fly!
Shoo!
[Ramon] Oh, come on, fly, vámonos! We need our sleep.
[Tommy] Let me take care of this.
[Ramon] How can you see a fly in the dark?
translation.it: Come fai a vederlo al buio?

translation.en: [Tommy] A true hunter sees with all his senses.
translation.it: Un vero cacciatore vede con tutti i sensi.

translation.en: [Ramon] That was some mystical shit, man.
translation.it: È stata una specie di magia.

translation.en: I think you just nicked his biscuits off.
translation.it: Mi sa che gli hai solo tagliato le palle.

translation.en: [Tommy] That's what I was aiming for.
He didn't deserve to die.
He deserved to know he was not welcome here.
translation.it: Meritava di sapere che qui non era gradito.

translation.en: [Ramon] Raised by Indians, huh?
That had some impact on you.
translation.it: Ha avuto un certo effetto su di te.

translation.en: [Ramon] Well, let me get this one.
[Ramon] Sounded like a horse fly.
That wasn't a horse fly, that was my horse!
translation.it: Non era una mosca cavallina, era il mio cavallo!

translation.en: Peanut?
[Ramon] Oh, the burro's gonna be pissed.
translation.it: Il ciuco si incazzerà a morte.

translation.en: [Ramon] You're doing bueno, Burro!
Don't be intimidated by the horse, you're just as good as him.
translation.it: Non farti intimidire dal cavallo, sei bravo quanto lui.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] I'm so hungry.
[Tommy] There's breakfast all around.
Nuts, berries, bark, different kinds of mud.
translation.it: Nocciole, frutti di bosco, cortecce, vari tipi di fango.

translation.en: I wish there were taco trees.
translation.it: Vorrei che ci fossero alberi di taco.

translation.en: What's a taco?
They're the best.
translation.it: La cosa più buona che ci sia.

translation.en: Meat and cheese and tomatoes in a crispy shell.
translation.it: Carne, formaggio e pomodori in un guscio croccante.

translation.en: You'd love it, man.
Ooh, I want one. I want 50.
Hate to put an end to this fascinating conversation,
translation.it: Odio mettere fine a questa conversazione affascinante,

translation.en: but we're here.
-[horse neighs] -Jawbone Falls.
[chuckles] And there's a mansion next to it!
Should we just go in?
I reckon.
[Tommy] Hello?
[chuckles] Well, this is cozy.
[Tommy] Hello?
Hold on!
[Lil Pete] Tommy!
[Lil Pete] Stop! Leave my brother alone!
Simon says, "Stop!"
Don't hurt my brother!
translation.it: Non fare del male a mio fratello!

translation.en: -Stop! -Huh?
Good thinking, Tommy.
[Tommy] All right.
Not for me, but good one, Tommy.
translation.it: Non per me, ma bella mossa, Tommy.

translation.en: [Tommy] Settle, settle, watch it...
It's all right, it's all right...
We don't mean no harm.
-We're just looking for our dad. -[Ramon] Sí.
Is this your place?
Whose place is it?
Your mother?
-[chuckles] -Oh, is she here right now?
Oh, she's dead.
I'm so sorry, I'm sure she was a good woman.
translation.it: Mi spiace, sono sicuro che fosse una brava donna.

translation.en: She died three years ago?
Three months ago?
Oh, your mama has three nipples?
-Yeah, there's three of us. -[exclaims]
-[Ramon] Three of us, sí. -Okay. Okay.
You and your mom were making moonshine up here, huh?
translation.it: Tu e tua madre facevate del liquore di contrabbando, eh?

translation.en: [Tommy] Much obliged.
Making moonshine for Frank Stockburn?
You know Frank Stockburn?
He slept here?
With your mama?
[chuckles] Your mama was an owl.
No, our dad made his mom make owl noises.
translation.it: No, nostro padre la faceva cantare come una civetta.

translation.en: Yeah, that's right, friend. We're your brothers.
translation.it: Sì, è così, amico. Noi siamo i tuoi fratelli.

translation.en: [laughing] Gall dang!
-Down the hatch, boys! -Salud. Salud.
What's your name, anyways?
Squiggly line, asterisk.
How 'bout we just call you Herm?
[Ramon] Herm, so you know,
our dad was kidnapped by some bad muchachos.
translation.it: che nostro padre è stato rapito da alcuni muchachos cattivi.

translation.en: -we need money to get him back. -[grunts]
translation.it: Sì, ci serve del denaro per salvarlo.

translation.en: So we're going to steal the money.
No, we're only stealing the money from folks what are bad.
translation.it: No, rubiamo soldi solo alle persone cattive.

translation.en: So do you know of any place where we could steal a lot of money from some bad folks?
translation.it: Conosci dei posti in cui potremmo rubare tanti soldi a delle persone cattive?

translation.en: [Tommy] He's got something.
The Gold Nugget Saloon, huh?
I reckon you're coming with us?
[woman] Smoking Fox so worried about White Knife.
translation.it: Gatta in Amore preoccupata per Lama Bianca.

translation.en: We must get her to eat something.
translation.it: Dobbiamo portare lei qualcosa da mangiare.

translation.en: Oh, we having a little picnic here, huh?
You have no right to be here! This Apache land!
translation.it: Voi no diritto di stare qui. Terra di Apache!

translation.en: And what you gonna do about it, beaver breath?
translation.it: E cosa farai, fiato di topo?

translation.en: How he know my name?
-[exclaims] -That's really her name!
Yeah, I think you also could have gone with "Face Like Witch."
Or "Eats Like Pig."
Or "Hit In Face With Diarrhea Stick."
That's it? Nobody else? Babyface? Stumbles?
[Gus Patch laughing] Hey, boss! Look what I got here!
[laughs] He ain't gonna be happy about this.
translation.it: Quel finto indiano bianco non ne sarà felice.

translation.en: Well, well, well.
[Doc Griffin] Yep, used to be a prosperous town.
Then the gold mine dried up and the train stopped stopping.
translation.it: BARBIERE - DOTTORE - DENTISTA Poi la miniera d'oro si è esaurita e il treno non si è più fermato.

translation.en: The saloon's the only place left that still does a good business.
translation.it: Il saloon è l'unico posto dove gli affari vanno bene.

translation.en: Open day and night since they built it. Ain't even a lock on the front door.
translation.it: SALOON LA PEPITA È aperto giorno e notte. Non ha neanche una serratura all'ingresso.

translation.en: It never closes.
They got a big ol' golden nugget hanging above the fireplace.
translation.it: Ha un'enorme pepita d'oro appesa sopra il camino.

translation.en: Folks come from all over just to take a look.
translation.it: La gente ci va anche solo per vederla.

translation.en: They say it's worth about $20,000, easy.
All right.
I'm surprised no one's ever tried to stolen that nugget.
translation.it: Mi sorprende che nessuno abbia mai provato a rubare quella pepita.

translation.en: -Oh, folks have tried. -[Lil Pete yelping]
If you go in there, you see their thumbs hanging above the bar.
translation.it: Se andate là, vedrete i loro pollici appesi sopra il bancone.

translation.en: Smiley Harris, the owner, bit them clean off.
translation.it: Il padrone Harris Sorriso li ha staccati di netto.

translation.en: So nobody messes with Smiley.
translation.it: Così nessuno fa il furbo con lui.

translation.en: That sort of tickled.
What we got going over here, friend?
Just open your robe, please.
I have never seen that big of a rash...
translation.it: Non avevo mai visto un simile sfogo cutaneo,

translation.en: or infection
or whatever this green bubble is.
translation.it: o qualunque cosa sia questa bolla verde.

translation.en: All right.
Now, son, I would simply recommend that you stop doing
translation.it: Ora, figliolo, vi consiglio di smettere di fare

translation.en: whatever it is you've been doing,
with whoever...
or whatever you've been doing it with.
Yep, now they call him Smiley,
'cause even when committing the most unspeakable atrocities,
translation.it: perché anche quando commette delle atrocità inenarrabili

translation.en: a cheerful grin never leaves his face.
All right, just lift your tail for me, please.
translation.it: Bene, solleva un po' la coda, per favore.

translation.en: Now, he's why that nugget has never been stolen.
translation.it: Per questo la pepita non è mai stata rubata.

translation.en: And never will be stolen.
This'll prevent infection.
[laughs] It tastes good, too.
This Smiley fella, sounds more like a hooligan than a barkeep.
translation.it: Questo Sorriso mi sembra più un bandito che il proprietario di un saloon.

translation.en: You're not far off.
Rumor has it that back in the old days
he used to run with the Frank Stockburn Gang.
translation.it: facesse parte della banda di Frank Stockburn.

translation.en: Lip balm?
I reckon I'm good.
♪ For breakfast My baby bakes my biscuits ♪
translation.it: A colazione Il mio tesoro cuoce i miei biscotti

translation.en: ♪ At lunchtime She puts honey in my tea ♪
translation.it: A pranzo mette il miele nel mio tè

translation.en: [man] Come on, champ!
♪ For supper She butters up my corn cob ♪
translation.it: A cena imburra la mia pannocchia

translation.en: ♪ And for dessert She gives that pudding to me ♪
translation.it: E per dolce mi offre il budino

translation.en: ♪ My baby knows my eggs are over easy ♪
translation.it: Sa come cucinare le mie uova al tegamino

translation.en: ♪ She lets me cut her coffee with my cream ♪
translation.it: Mi fa mescolare il suo caffè Con la mia crema

translation.en: ♪ I've got a hankering for some cherry pie ♪
translation.it: Vado pazzo per la torta alla ciliegia

translation.en: ♪ My baby always licks the ladle clean ♪
translation.it: E lei lecca sempre il mestolo

translation.en: That Smiley fellow, he don't joke around.
[Smiley] Oh... I joke around...
but never when it comes to my business.
Welcome to the Gold Nugget, gentlemen.
Mr. Harris, it's quite a nice spread you got here.
translation.it: Sig. Harris, avete proprio un bel locale.

translation.en: So what brings you gentlemen to town?
Actually, we wanted to ask you about something, Mr. Harris.
translation.it: A dire la verità, volevamo chiedervi una cosa, sig. Harris.

translation.en: Excuse me.
I am conversing with these gentlemen, sir. I shall be with you in a moment.
translation.it: Sto parlando con questi signori. Sarò da voi tra poco.

translation.en: I need to talk to you about Frank Stockburn.
I haven't heard that name in many a year.
translation.it: Non sento quel nome da tanti anni.

translation.en: You know him.
Mr. Stockburn and I were business partners.
translation.it: Io e il sig. Stockburn eravamo soci in affari.

translation.en: I got a photograph.
You see, that there's him... and that's you.
translation.it: Vedete, questo è lui... e questo siete voi.

translation.en: You rode in his gang.
To be precise... it was our gang.
translation.it: Per la precisione, era la nostra banda.

translation.en: He went on to a criminal career of some renown,
translation.it: Lui ha ottenuto una certa fama come criminale

translation.en: while I achieved great success in the legitimate business world.
translation.it: e io ho conseguito ampio successo nel mondo degli affari legittimi.

translation.en: Please help me.
Sir, you are becoming a nuisance.
I just need to tell him what I've done.
I think he's had enough, boss.
translation.it: Penso che ne abbia avute abbastanza, capo.

translation.en: My apologies, gentlemen.
Not my favorite subject.
A round on the house.
translation.it: Questo giro lo offre la casa.

translation.en: And, Chico, if you ever grab my arm like that again,
translation.it: Chico, se ti azzardi di nuovo ad afferrarmi il braccio così,

translation.en: I'll put six bullets in your head.
translation.it: ti piazzo sei pallottole in testa.

translation.en: -[groans] -That's quite a beating.
Hope you and your drink are okay.
translation.it: Spero che tu e il tuo drink stiate bene.

translation.en: Why do you want to meet this Frank Stockburn so badly, huh?
translation.it: Perché desideri così tanto incontrare questo Frank Stockburn?

translation.en: Frank Stockburn's my father.
If Frank Stockburn is your father, raise your hand.
translation.it: Se Frank Stockburn è tuo padre, alza la mano.

translation.en: Gall dang!
[Tommy] Chico's right. Getting late, starting to thin out.
translation.it: Chico ha ragione. Quando è sera, c'è meno gente.

translation.en: Can I tell you guys something?
Because I don't wanna have no secrets between us.
translation.it: Non voglio che tra noi ci siano segreti.

translation.en: Of course.
-Yeah, we're brothers. -Yeah.
Now, I know Dad is a white man, but my mother... was actually black.
translation.it: So che mio padre è bianco, ma mia madre era nera.

translation.en: So that, technically, makes me half-black.
translation.it: Questo, tecnicamente, fa di me un mulatto.

translation.en: Is that right?
Well, I didn't wanna hide that from you
in case you guys slipped up and made some racial slurs
translation.it: nel caso, per sbaglio, faceste qualche battuta razzista

translation.en: -not knowing I wasn't 100% white. -Hmm.
translation.it: non sapendo che non sono bianco al 100%.

translation.en: I mean, I knew she must've been really muscular,
translation.it: Ho pensato che avessi una madre muscolosa,

translation.en: but I had no idea she was black.
translation.it: ma non avrei mai immaginato che fosse nera.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I guess, now that you mention it, I see it a little bit.
translation.it: Ora che ce l'hai detto, un po' si vede.

translation.en: My mother's Swedish.
I don't think so. I reckon she's Mexican.
translation.it: Non credo. Penso che sia messicana.

translation.en: Lying bitch!
So do you new brothers have any special skills
translation.it: Voi nuovi fratelli avete qualche abilità speciale

translation.en: that could help us out here tonight?
