translation.it: E con ciò? Non possiamo arrenderci.

translation.en: They're going to kill him!
Ain't no difference. He's dying anyways.
translation.it: Non fa differenza. Tanto morirà comunque.

translation.en: Dad's sick.
I'm sorry I didn't tell y'all.
translation.it: Mi dispiace di non avervelo detto.

translation.en: There's a good chance he's dead already.
translation.it: È molto probabile che sia già morto.

translation.en: But there's a chance he's not. You got to meet him, Tommy.
translation.it: Ma forse non è morto. Tu l'hai conosciuto, Tommy.

translation.en: The rest of us...
Even if it was just for five minutes, it'd be worth it.
translation.it: vogliamo poter passare con lui almeno cinque minuti.

translation.en: If I don't talk to Dad, I'll die with this dirty secret burnin' a hole in my guts.
translation.it: Se non parlo con mio padre, morirò con questo sporco segreto che mi tormenta.

translation.en: Danito, whatever it is you did, you have to forgive yourself, man.
translation.it: Danito, qualunque cosa tu abbia fatto, devi perdonare te stesso.

translation.en: You wouldn't say that if you know what I done.
translation.it: Non diresti così se sapessi di che si tratta.

translation.en: -Everybody's got secrets, Danny. -[Ramon] Yeah.
translation.it: - Tutti quanti hanno dei segreti. - Già.

translation.en: You guys are the first people I told I was black.
translation.it: Voi siete gli unici a cui ho detto di essere nero.

translation.en: You know how good that made me feel?
translation.it: E questo mi ha fatto stare molto meglio.

translation.en: We're your brothers.
You can tell us anything.
I, uh...
I used to work for the President of the United States.
translation.it: Io lavoravo per il Presidente degli Stati Uniti.

translation.en: I was his personal bodyguard. One of the best.
translation.it: Ero la sua guardia del corpo personale. Ero uno dei migliori.

translation.en: Till one night...
Mr. President, say, I'm gonna go hit the little boys' room.
translation.it: Sig. Presidente, ho bisogno di andare in bagno.

translation.en: Are you shitting me?
Come on! You'll be fine, superstar.
Can I get ya something on the way back? Agua? Brewski?
translation.it: Posso portarvi qualcosa quando torno? Agua? Birra?

translation.en: Mrs. Lincoln, how about one of them big pretzels or a little pillow?
translation.it: Sig.ra Lincoln, che ne dite di un brezel o di un cuscino?

translation.en: I hear this play's kind of a long one.
translation.it: Ho sentito dire che la commedia è lunga.

translation.en: All right, fair enough. I'll be back in two.
Where's the president's box?
-John Wilkes Booth, the actor? -Yeah.
No way, man! Big fan!
-You wanna say hi to the president? -Yeah.
He'd get a real kick out of that. Last door on the left.
translation.it: Ne sarà molto felice. Ultima porta a sinistra.

translation.en: -Thank you. [chuckles nervously] -Really cool.
Wow! Love that guy!
-[gunshot] -[woman screams]
translation.it: LOCANDINA - TEATRO FORD IL NOSTRO CUGINO AMERICANO

translation.en: [screaming] Abe!
[sighs] How can you go on living your life knowing you harmed so many people?
translation.it: Come si può continuare a vivere sapendo di aver fatto del male a tanti?

translation.en: That's what I wanna ask Dad.
translation.it: È quello che voglio chiedere a papà.

translation.en: Hey, you ain't the one who pulled that trigger.
translation.it: Non sei tu quello che ha premuto il grilletto.

translation.en: But if Dad's gotta be the one who tells you that...
translation.it: Ma se vuoi sentirlo dire da papà...

translation.en: then let's go get that money.
I just wish I knew how.
Herm's got an idea.
He just can't express it.
I just wish somebody here could speak Herm.
translation.it: Se qualcuno sapesse parlare la sua lingua!

translation.en: [man] Tomorrow is Valentine's Day.
That's when Ezekiel Grant has his annual high-stakes poker game.
translation.it: Ezekiel Grant organizzerà l'annuale torneo di poker con forti puntate.

translation.en: There'll be oodles of money there. Oodles, I say.
translation.it: Ci saranno un mucchio di quattrini.

translation.en: -I don't know. That sounds risky. -What's risky?
translation.it: - Non saprei. Sembra rischioso. - Cos'è rischioso?

translation.en: He's suggesting we... knock off Ezekiel Grant's poker game.
translation.it: Suggerisce di rubare il premio in denaro del torneo di poker di Ezekiel Grant.

translation.en: -It's in Yuma tomorrow night. -[speaks gibberish]
Yuma's less than a day's walk from here.
translation.it: È a meno di un giorno di cammino da qui.

translation.en: That poker game, there's practically gonna be an army protectin' it.
translation.it: Ci sarà un esercito a guardia di quel premio.

translation.en: If Tommy says we can beat 'em, I'll believe him.
translation.it: Se Tommy dice che possiamo farcela, mi fido di lui.

translation.en: -We all will. -[grunts]
We can beat 'em...
for Dad.
[all] For Dad!
I hope you like the gift I'm giving you for Valentine's Day, Ezekiel.
translation.it: Spero che apprezzerai il mio regalo di San Valentino, Ezekiel.

translation.en: I'll give you a hint. One-hour massage, no charge.
translation.it: Ti do un indizio. Un'ora di massaggio senza pagare.

translation.en: You know what gift I'd really love?
translation.it: Sai quale regalo mi piacerebbe davvero?

translation.en: If you would just shut up!
Nothing ruins a good poker game more...
translation.it: Niente rovina una bella partita di poker

translation.en: than a lady jabbering on and on...
translation.it: più di una donna che straparla.

translation.en: -How romantic. -[knocking on door]
Well, General Custer!
Yes, at your service.
Mr. Mark Twain.
-Word up! -Gentlemen, do come in.
Yo, Zeke, big boy, I was just going off to the General here about my new book.
translation.it: Ehi, Zeke, stavo parlando al Generale del mio nuovo libro.

translation.en: -It's a sequel to Tom Sawyer. -Ooh.
translation.it: È il seguito di Tom Sawyer.

translation.en: It's about Sawyer's home slice, Huckleberry Finn.
translation.it: Parla dell'amico di Sawyer, Huckleberry Finn.

translation.en: White boy goes raftin' with a brother. People gonna lose their shit!
translation.it: Farà un viaggio in zattera con un nero. La gente andrà fuori di testa!

translation.en: And, General Custer, I see you've let your dashing blond hair grow out.
translation.it: Generale, vedo che ti sei fatto crescere i tuoi splendidi capelli biondi.

translation.en: Well, yes, the barber down at the regiment is just awful,
translation.it: Sì, il barbiere del reggimento è pessimo,

translation.en: so I had two choices, either let it grow or get scalped.
translation.it: quindi avevo due scelte: farmeli crescere o farmi fare lo scalpo.

translation.en: -And I ain't gonna let that happen. -[Mark and Ezekiel laughing]
translation.it: E non permetterò che ciò accada.

translation.en: Now, will our old friend from Tombstone be joining us?
translation.it: Verrà anche il nostro vecchio amico di Tombstone?

translation.en: [Ezekiel] Late as usual.
translation.it: È in ritardo come al solito.

translation.en: But we have a new player, a wealthy Mexican coffee bean rancher.
translation.it: Ma abbiamo un nuovo giocatore, un ricco coltivatore messicano di caffè.

translation.en: Am I tardy-o?
Oh. [laughing] Sneaky little Mexican.
May I present Don Don Diego.
We run a gentleman's game here, Mr. Diego.
translation.it: È una partita tra gentiluomini, sig. Diego.

translation.en: Your, uh, two bodyguards are completely unnecessary.
translation.it: Non avete bisogno delle vostre due guardie del corpo.

translation.en: Bodyguards? [laughing]
[lisping] You're mistaken, General.
This is, um...
Chimichanga... my loyal manservant.
God bless you.
[Ramon] And, um...
Blanco Beardio.
He'll be providing the entertainment for this afternoon's festivities.
translation.it: Ci intratterrà suonando per noi durante le amenità pomeridiane.

translation.en: Well, drop me a beat.
All right.
Here we go now.
Gentlemen, the buy-in is $15,000.
translation.it: Signori, la quota iniziale è di 15.000 dollari.

translation.en: Fifteen large? Are you sure General Custard can swing that?
translation.it: Quindicimila? Sicuro che il generale Castor li abbia?

translation.en: It's Custer, not "Custard." There is no "D." I'm not a dessert.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Custer, non "Castor". Non sono un animale.

translation.en: Boom, I just dropped some satire on your ass, General!
translation.it: Bum! Ti sto solo coglionando, Generale.

translation.en: You got me!
Hey! Now, when Ramon gives the signal that the time is right,
that's when we move in.
You remember the signal, right?
translation.it: Il segnale te lo ricordi, vero?

translation.en: -[man] Gentlemen. -You know where to go, Marshal.
Oh, hell, no!
That's Wyatt Earp!
The fastest gun in the West?
translation.it: La pistola più veloce del West?

translation.en: All right, all right, all right!
-Oh, Wyatt Earp, as I live and breathe! -[whispers] Wyatt Earp.
translation.it: - Wyatt Earp in carne e ossa! - Wyatt Earp.

translation.en: [Ezekiel] You're here! [General Custer] Wyatt Earp.
[Wyatt] Sorry I'm late, everybody.
But apparently, there's some new gang out there robbing everybody blind.
translation.it: A quanto pare, c'è una nuova banda che ruba a destra e a manca.

translation.en: Oh, they call themselves the Ridiculous 6.
I swear, a man can't ride five miles in this territory
translation.it: Non si possono percorrere più di otto chilometri da queste parti

translation.en: without running into outlaws, rattlesnakes, Injuns and--
translation.it: senza imbattersi in fuorilegge, serpenti a sonagli, indiani...

translation.en: Hey! Why don't you let me worry about the Injuns?
translation.it: Ehi! Perché non lasci che mi occupi io degli indiani?

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[Wyatt] Will do, General.
What's shakin', Twain?
Hey, I'm good on anything. Just like gravy, baby.
translation.it: Alla grande. Fila tutto liscio come l'olio.

translation.en: -Good to see you, my man. -You too, man.
translation.it: - È bello vederti. - Anche per me, bello.

translation.en: Hey! I finally read Prince and the Pauper.
translation.it: Ho finalmente letto Il principe e il povero.

translation.en: Oh, is that right?
Didn't get it.
For reals?
-Satire! Boom! I got ya! -[all laughing]
-I'm just pulling your leg. -Oh, man.
translation.it: - Ti sto prendendo in giro. - Cavolo.

translation.en: I can't read.
Good one with the... satire.
translation.it: Ci sapete fare con le battute.

translation.en: [laughs] Funny.
Who's this idiot?
Um... I am Don...
Don Don Diego.
Well, Don, I'm Wyatt...
Wyatt Wyatt Earp.
Got him.
[in sing-song voice] Now let's play some cards!
♪ Say, say Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Say Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Say the blacks and the whites are getting along ♪
translation.it: Dite i neri e i bianchi vanno d'accordo

translation.en: ♪ The blacks and the whites are getting along ♪
translation.it: I neri e i bianchi vanno d'accordo

translation.en: ♪ I can't read ♪
♪ I can't read ♪
-[screaming] -[Ezekiel] Please calm yourself!
Let's get inside before this Wyatt Earp ruins our plan.
translation.it: Andiamo dentro prima che Wyatt Earp ci rovini il piano.

translation.en: But there's no way for you to sneak past them guys, Tommy.
translation.it: Ma non riuscirai a entrare senza farti notare, Tommy.

translation.en: There's no rocks, no trees, no nothing to hide behind.
translation.it: Non ci sono rocce, alberi, niente dietro cui nasconderti.

translation.en: No need to hide, brother, when you are friends with the wind.
translation.it: Non c'è bisogno di nascondersi, fratello, quando il vento è tuo amico.

translation.en: I'm telling you, down there, they don't call it "Mexico."
translation.it: Sai, da queste parti non dicono "Mexico".

translation.en: It's "Mehico." The "X" is an "H." I'm presuming Texas is "Tehas."
translation.it: Dicono "Mehico". La "X" è una "H". Immagino che "Texas" sia "Tehas".

translation.en: Now, what's this?
Just a tumbleweed, you jumpy bastard.
That is some mystical shit.
I wish to move the dresser in my bedroom closer to the window,
translation.it: Vorrei spostare il cassettone della mia stanza da letto,

translation.en: but I haven't the strength to do it myself.
translation.it: ma non ho la forza per farlo da sola.

translation.en: I'd love to help, ma'am, but I really should keep playing the piano.
translation.it: Vorrei potervi aiutare, signora, ma dovrei continuare a suonare.

translation.en: -[piano music continues playing] -No one will even know you're gone.
translation.it: Nessuno si accorgerà della tua assenza.

translation.en: -Gentlemen, cough up your buy-ins. -All right!
translation.it: - Signori, sborsate le vostre quote. - D'accordo.

translation.en: Make it rain like Twain.
[General Custer] Take that and that. [Mark] Yeah!
Sure is some good hooch there, Zeke. Where'd you find that?
translation.it: Questo intruglio è proprio buono, Zeke. Dove l'hai trovato?

translation.en: Oh, I got that from a case about, uh, 20 years ago.
translation.it: Proviene da un cassa vecchia di 20 anni.

translation.en: In fact, uh, you know that shack up by Jawbone Falls?
translation.it: Conosci quella baracca accanto alle cascate Jawbone?

translation.en: -Yeah. -There was a lady living there.
It was one of Frank Stockburn's many paramours.
translation.it: Era una delle tante amanti di Frank Stockburn.

translation.en: Now this was one of the ugliest ladies I've ever seen in my life.
translation.it: Era una delle donne più brutte che avessi mai visto in vita mia.

translation.en: Sounds like a real bucket of turds.
But she was a very talented distiller of alcohol.
translation.it: Ma era una maga nel distillare l'alcol.

translation.en: [chucking] So, while she--
While she's loading up my coach, her young boy comes out,
translation.it: Mentre lei caricava la mia carrozza, spuntò suo figlio,

translation.en: this big shambling oaf, mute, filthy as a hog,
translation.it: un bufalo gigantesco, sgraziato, muto, sporco come un maiale

translation.en: and he starts doing this horrible little tap dance
translation.it: e iniziò a ballare il tip tap in modo orribile

translation.en: whilst singing "The Star-Spangled Banner."
translation.it: e a cantare l'inno nazionale americano.

translation.en: Well, not singing it, really, but grunting it, like a caveman!
translation.it: Più che cantare, sembrava grugnire come un cavernicolo.

translation.en: You know, he wants me to throw him some pennies,
translation.it: Voleva che gli lanciassi qualche penny,

translation.en: so I fished a coin out of my pocket
translation.it: così pescai una moneta dalla mia tasca

translation.en: and I guess I don't know my own strength.
translation.it: e forse la lanciai troppo forte.

translation.en: I tossed it, hit him in the mouth, and knocked his tooth out!
translation.it: La moneta lo colpì in bocca e gli fece cadere un dente!

translation.en: What an asshole!
[mumbles] Mama.
In any event, I still have one bottle left from that case.
translation.it: In ogni caso, mi è rimasta ancora una bottiglia.

translation.en: I'll go fetch it and we can drink a toast to that awful woman and her hideous son.
translation.it: La prendo. Brinderemo alla donna orribile e a quel mostro di suo figlio.

translation.en: Oh, she was ugly! You wouldn't even sleep with her.
translation.it: Era bruttissima! Neanche tu andresti a letto con lei.

translation.en: Say, Don Don Diego...
translation.it: Dite un po', Don Don Diego...

translation.en: where's your buy-in?
I thought it was 15 grand a man.
Let's see. Ah!
It's you!
What?
What "what"?
What are you so surprised about?
Just so surprised at all the... the fun that we're having here,
translation.it: Sono sorpreso di tutto... questo divertimento!

translation.en: with the card and the money and the booze and...
translation.it: Le carte, i soldi, gli alcolici...

translation.en: You know, I make that same face when I put my cologne on in the morning,
translation.it: Io faccio la stessa espressione quando mi do il profumo al mattino,

translation.en: especially when I'm home alone.
translation.it: specialmente quando sono a casa da solo.

translation.en: You know what I think?
I think Don Don Diego isn't really a coffee bean rancher at all.
translation.it: Penso che Don Don Diego non sia davvero un coltivatore di caffè,

translation.en: And his true purpose here is to rob us.
translation.it: ma che sia qui per rapinarci.

translation.en: Don't make me kill you, Mr. Earp. Hands up high.
translation.it: Non costringetemi a uccidervi. Mani in alto.

translation.en: Oh, snap! You got the drop on Wyatt Earp?
translation.it: Accipicchia! Hai avuto la meglio su Wyatt Earp?

translation.en: It's mi hermano. He's one bad hombre. [laughs]
translation.it: È mi hermano. È un hombre cattivo.

translation.en: [Tommy] No disrespect, fellas.
We're gonna have to tie you up, and we'll have to borrow your horses.
translation.it: Dobbiamo legarvi e prendere in prestito i vostri cavalli.

translation.en: Ooh, what'd I miss?
[Ramon] Sweet Hog Rock, here we come!
[Ramon] Giddy up, Burro.
[Danny] Come on, Ramon!
[Chico] Right behind you, Tommy!
[Ramon] Hurry up, Burro! Move your ass!
[Tommy] Yeah, I think we found it.
translation.it: Credo proprio che abbiamo trovato la Roccia.

translation.en: That is one sweet hog right there.
That is a sweet, majestic hog.
Yeah, that's a sweet one for sure.
It's all right.
I'm confused. I don't see a hog or a pig anywhere.
translation.it: Non capisco. Non vedo uccelli o altri animali da queste parti.

translation.en: [chuckling] All I see is the big old rock that looks like a weenie pee-pee.
translation.it: Vedo solo una vecchia e grossa roccia a forma di pisello.

translation.en: -Oh, you guys call a pee-pee a "hog." -Yeah.
translation.it: - Ah, dite "uccello" per dire pisello. - Già.

translation.en: -That's weird. I like it, though. [laughs] -Yeah. Okay.
translation.it: - È strano. Però mi piace. - Bene.

translation.en: Problem is, I don't see no singing windmill anywhere.
translation.it: Il problema è che non vedo nessun mulino che canta.

translation.en: -[distant humming] -Wait...
I hear it.
Yeah, it's coming from over there.
[Lil Pete] Ah! Daddy! Daddy!
Daddy! [gasps] Huh?
We're saved! We're saved!
Oh, it's just these assholes.
What the hell happened to you guys?
[spits] We was headed west to Frisco after we absconded with your loot.
translation.it: Eravamo diretti a San Francisco dopo essere fuggiti con il vostro bottino.

translation.en: But we ran into these real bad characters.
translation.it: Ma siamo incappati in dei brutti ceffi.

translation.en: It was Cicero something and his crazy-ass gang.
translation.it: Cicero qualcosa e la sua banda di folli.

translation.en: Cicero was here? Then he left?
translation.it: Cicero è stato qui? E se n'è andato?

translation.en: [voice breaking] He left us in the dirt for fun.
Who does that?
Sicko! [screams]
If this is where the singing windmill is, then why would they just up and leave?
translation.it: Se il mulino che canta è qui, perché se ne sarebbero andati?

translation.en: Maybe that Stickie McSchnickens guy was just pulling our leg.
translation.it: Forse il tizio dello Smanazza La Mazza ci ha presi in giro.

translation.en: They went north... about two hours ago.
translation.it: Sono andati a nord, circa due ora fa.

translation.en: Oh, yeah! Tommy can track 'em.
Let's saddle up. We're burning daylight.
[Left-Eye Boys] Wait!
[Will Patch] You can't just leave us here, you gotta get us out!
translation.it: Non potete lasciarci qui, dovete tirarci fuori!

translation.en: -[snake rattling] -You don't need to-- Hey, hey, hey! We still got the money!
translation.it: Non dovete... Ehi! Abbiamo ancora i soldi!

translation.en: Yeah, I hid it in my pants. [stuttering] We'll give it back to ya!
translation.it: Sì, li ho nascosti nei pantaloni. Ve li ridaremo!

translation.en: We don't need no more. Let's go!
Hey! Can you at least help me pick these ants out of my beard before you head out?
translation.it: Potete almeno togliermi le formiche dalla barba prima che ve ne andiate?

translation.en: Please?
Tell you what, we'll dig you up on one condition.
translation.it: Facciamo così. Vi liberiamo a una condizione.

translation.en: -[all exclaiming] -You say it, we'll do it!
That you give up your lives of crime
and take this second chance to start doing good by people.
translation.it: e cogliete quest'occasione per iniziare a fare del bene.

translation.en: -I'd rather die! -Hell, no! I ain't doing that!
translation.it: - Preferisco morire! - Mai e poi mai! Non lo farò!

translation.en: No way! Dumb Indian half!
That was a joke! That was a joke!
I'll be a good boy! I'll be a good boy, Daddy!
translation.it: Mi comporterò bene! Farò il bravo, papà!

translation.en: [Ramon] Now what? East or west?
Late in the day.
Lot of traffic been going through here.
translation.it: C'è stato molto traffico da queste parti.

translation.en: It's going to take a minute.
Well, we must be getting mighty close.
They'd better be treating Dad well, or they're gonna have to answer to us.
translation.it: Gli conviene trattare bene papà o faranno i conti con noi.

translation.en: There he is. -There's the man himself. -[Herm grunting]
-Look at that handsome hombre. -[Danny] Yeah.
-That's where we get our good looks. -[chuckling]
Let me see ol' Pop.
[Ramon] Does he still look like that, Tommy?
Yeah, he does.
Let's set up camp tonight. Right out there.
But we can't waste any time.
Chico... I can't figure it out right now.
translation.it: Chico, al momento non ho le idee chiare.

translation.en: I gotta...
Just give me till sunrise. Let me think.
translation.it: Datemi tempo fino all'alba per pensare.

translation.en: [Tommy] Dear brothers,
by the time you read this, I will have caught up with Dad.
translation.it: quando leggerete questa lettera, io avrò raggiunto papà.

translation.en: And I'm sure you're sore at me for sneaking out on you.
translation.it: Sono sicuro che sarete arrabbiati con me per essere partito di nascosto.

translation.en: But this fellow, Cicero, who took Pa, also took my mother's life,
translation.it: Ma il tizio che ha preso papà, Cicero, ha anche preso la vita di mia madre

translation.en: and I mean to make him pay for that.
Things might get messy.
I can live with all the bad stuff we've done,
translation.it: Posso convivere con le cose brutte che abbiamo fatto,

translation.en: the hold-ups, the burglaries, the accidental decapitation,
translation.it: le rapine, i furti, la decapitazione accidentale,

translation.en: but I couldn't live with myself if something happened to one of you.
translation.it: ma non riuscirei a perdonarmi se dovesse capitare qualcosa a uno di voi.

translation.en: So stay put and I'll be back with Dad as soon as I can.
translation.it: Quindi statene fuori e tornerò con papà appena possibile.

translation.en: And if I don't come back, know that I love you boys with all my heart.
translation.it: E se non torno, sappiate che vi voglio bene con tutto il cuore.

translation.en: Your brother, Tommy.
[Tommy] Whoa.
[Frank] Down at Silver Canyon...
Meeting Betty Dunson... was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.it: Incontrare Betty Dunson è stata la mia fortuna più grande.

translation.en: Mom was his biggest score.
translation.it: È stata la mamma il suo colpo più importante.

translation.en: [Cicero] Here we are.
We'd better not have come all this way for nothing.
translation.it: Spero di non aver viaggiato così a lungo per niente.

translation.en: -I want the money, Frank. -I know what you want.
translation.it: - Voglio il denaro, Frank. - So quello che vuoi.

translation.en: [Tommy] There's your money.
Count it.
Oh, look who showed up.
I didn't know if somebody dug up what you buried, Pa,
translation.it: Non ero sicuro che il denaro seppellito fosse ancora qua,

translation.en: so I wanted to make sure you were covered either way.
translation.it: quindi volevo offrirvi una valida alternativa.

translation.en: Thank you, son.
Well, ain't that a good boy.
That's my boy.
Well, it's been a pleasure, Frank.
But, uh... we'll be on our way.
translation.it: Noi continuiamo per la nostra strada.

translation.en: Not so fast.
You and me got some unfinished business.
translation.it: Io e te abbiamo dei conti in sospeso.

translation.en: No, our business is done.
translation.it: No, non abbiamo niente in sospeso.

translation.en: Pa... you remember how I told you Ma died?
translation.it: Papà, ricordate cosa vi ho detto sulla morte della mamma?

translation.en: Well, the son of a bitch who shot her...
translation.it: Beh, il figlio di puttana che le sparò...

translation.en: had a tattoo on his hand...
just like Cicero here.
What, you mean...
my little horseshoe?
That's always brought me luck.
Especially when I was shooting somebody.
Well, killer, your luck just ran out.
translation.it: Bene, assassino, la tua fortuna finisce qui.

translation.en: Your hand touch that knife, boy,
it'll be the last thing you ever touch.
Oh, I ain't using these knives.
translation.it: Non ho intenzione di usare questi coltelli.

translation.en: Not for my mama.
I saved a special one just for you.
translation.it: Ne ho messo da parte uno speciale per te.

translation.en: Now you die, Injun-lover.
He dies, you die.
translation.it: Se muore lui, morirete anche voi.

translation.en: Fourteen of us, six of you. Doesn't seem quite fair, does it?
translation.it: Noi siamo in 14, voi in sei. Non è uno scontro alla pari, vero?

translation.en: Make that twelve of us.
translation.it: E in tutto fa 12 con noi.

translation.en: [shouting] Twelve of us!
I ain't sign up for this shit.
You seeing this?
-It's not working. -What are you doing?
Don't look like a tumbleweed at all, Herm.
translation.it: Non assomiglia affatto a un rotolacampo.

translation.en: Herm, come back! Come back, Herm.
All right, all right. Now, everybody just calm down.
translation.it: Va bene. Diamoci tutti una calmata.

translation.en: A man's entitled... to kill his mother's killer.
translation.it: Un uomo ha il diritto di uccidere l'assassino della propria madre.

translation.en: Plus... that's one less guy you've got to split the money with!
translation.it: Inoltre, avete un uomo in meno con cui spartire i soldi!

translation.en: Good thinking, Frank. Let's ride!
translation.it: È un buon ragionamento, Frank. Andiamo!

translation.en: [Gus Patch] Yeah! [Will Patch] Yeah, get on out of here!
Good job, son. I'm really proud of you.
translation.it: Ottimo lavoro, figliolo. Sono molto fiero di te.

translation.en: And getting your friends to come all the way out here with you, brilliant.
translation.it: E portare i tuoi amici con te fino a qui è stato geniale.

translation.en: Well, sir... they ain't just my friends, they, uh...
translation.it: Beh, non sono solo miei amici...

translation.en: They're my brothers.
Five?
You had fun, didn't you, sir?
Well, I'm gonna introduce myself.
-I think they'd like that. -[clears throat]
Frank Stockburn, your dad.
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you.
-Father. -Son.
This is my burro.
Proud to know you, Burro.
He's proud.
You must be, uh, Saint Louis, right?
translation.it: Tu devi essere Saint Louis, vero?

translation.en: Boy, you got your mom's muscles.
translation.it: Hai proprio i muscoli di tua madre.

translation.en: You a prizefighter?
No, actually, I'm a... piano player.
Oh, well, I'll be!
You know, I've been known to tickle the ivories myself.
Now and then, you know.
We should play together sometime. [chuckles]
I'd like that, Dad.
[voice breaking] I'd like that a lot.
Yeah, son, we'll do that.
You must be Delilah's boy.
translation.it: Tu devi essere il figlio di Delilah.

translation.en: Boy, she made some fine, fine whiskey.
She must've been really hitting it hard when she was pregnant with you.
translation.it: Chissà quanto avrà bevuto mentre era incinta.

translation.en: Atta boy, atta boy.
[grunts] Da-da.
And, uh... you are?
I'm Lil Pete. I'm your son! I love you so much, Dad!
translation.it: Sono Mini Pete. Sono vostro figlio! Vi voglio tanto bene, papà!

translation.en: -I have three nipples. -Yeah, well...
It's always good to have a spare.
translation.it: Fa comodo averne uno di scorta.

translation.en: -Gall dang, you have one, too? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Cacchiarola, ne avete uno anche voi? - Sì.

translation.en: Do you like to play with the extra one?
Oh, you betcha.
Oh, Pa, I have a question for you.
translation.it: Papà, ho una domanda per voi.

translation.en: Where do babies come from?
Well, son, the mom just poops 'em out.
translation.it: Figliolo, la mamma li espelle dal sedere.

translation.en: [laughing] I knewed it! I knewed it, Dad!
Well, look at this handsome devil.
Sir, I'm Danny.
It's awful nice to finally meet ya.
Could you help me with a problem?
I did a real stupid thing
translation.it: Ho fatto una cosa molto stupida

translation.en: that inadvertently led to the death of a United States President,
translation.it: che inavvertitamente ha causato la morte di un presidente degli Stati Uniti

translation.en: and I'm feeling pretty lousy about it.
translation.it: e questo mi fa stare malissimo.

translation.en: Well, son... look in my eyes.
Shit happens.
-Yeah, right. -[both chuckling]
Thanks. Thank you, sir.
-[Frank] You're welcome. -[exhales]
So, where to now, huh?
Well, sir, Smoking Fox and me are getting married in a few days,
translation.it: Io e Gatta in Amore ci sposeremo tra qualche giorno

translation.en: and Screaming Eagle's walking her down the aisle,
translation.it: e Aquila Urlante la condurrà all'altare.

translation.en: and I was hoping...
you could be there, next to me.
translation.it: che ci foste anche voi, accanto a me.

translation.en: Oh, you mean your best man?
translation.it: Vuoi che ti faccia da testimone?

translation.en: Yes, sir.
Oh, Tommy...
You know, that's... that's quite an honor.
-It would be my honor, sir. -Yeah. Well, uh...
But unfortunately, I...
I got some business up north that I gotta attend to.
translation.it: ...ho alcune faccende a nord che devo sbrigare.

translation.en: I gotta collect some gambling debts and...
translation.it: Devo riscuotere dei debiti di gioco e...

translation.en: You know, just to pay the doctors and such.
Say, Dad. You don't ever gotta worry about money ever again.
translation.it: Non dovrete mai più preoccuparvi dei soldi.

translation.en: We had to conjure up 50 grand twice!
translation.it: Abbiamo dovuto raggranellare 50.000 dollari due volte!

translation.en: So we ended up with 100!
translation.it: E alla fine siamo arrivati a 100.000!

translation.en: -A hundred? -[Tommy] Yes, sir.
There's another 50 grand?
Yes, sir.
Right here, in the burro's saddlebag.
translation.it: Proprio qui, nella bisaccia sul ciuco.

translation.en: So that business can wait up north, can't it... best man?
translation.it: Dunque quelle faccende possono aspettare, vero, signor testimone?

translation.en: Well, now that you mention it, maybe I should change my plans.
translation.it: Ora che me lo dici, forse dovrei rivedere i miei piani.

translation.en: Hey! What are they doing back?
translation.it: Ehi! Che ci fanno di nuovo qui?

translation.en: What is this?
I guess it's time you kids
translation.it: Penso che sia il momento, figlioli,

translation.en: learned the truth about your dear old dad, huh?
translation.it: che sappiate la verità sul vostro caro e vecchio papà.

translation.en: I'm just too famous.
I can't walk into any town west of the Rockies
translation.it: Non posso entrare in nessuna città a ovest delle Montagne Rocciose

translation.en: without someone calling the law.
translation.it: senza che qualcuno chiami le autorità.

translation.en: So, I came up with a way we could make 50 grand
translation.it: Così ho escogitato un modo per guadagnare 50.000 dollari

translation.en: without lifting a finger. [chuckles]
And you rascals brought us double!
translation.it: E voi bricconcelli me ne avete portati il doppio!

translation.en: Are these my kids or what?
Son of a bitch!
If our two gangs joined forces,
translation.it: Se le nostre due bande si unissero,

translation.en: there's not a lawman in the West that would stand up against us.
translation.it: nessuno sceriffo in tutto il West potrebbe mai fermarci.

translation.en: What makes you think we'd turn to a life of crime?
translation.it: Cosa vi fa pensare che vorremmo diventare dei criminali?

translation.en: 'Cause it's in your blood.
Answer me something.
Were you ever great at anything in your life besides stealing?
translation.it: Siete mai stati bravi a fare qualcosa, in vita vostra, a parte rubare?

translation.en: You apples didn't fall far from this tree.
translation.it: Voi mele non siete cadute lontano da questo albero.

translation.en: Don't deny who you are.
If you knew who we really were,
translation.it: Se voi sapeste chi siamo veramente,

translation.en: you'd be very scared right now.
Don't overplay your hand, son.
I'm still holding an ace.
translation.it: Ho ancora un asso nella manica.

translation.en: I found her. I-- I told you I'd find her.
translation.it: L'ho trovata! Vi avevo detto che ci sarei riuscito.

translation.en: This little beauty stumbled into our camp a few days ago.
translation.it: Questa bellezza è capitata per caso nel nostro accampamento qualche giorno fa.

translation.en: She actually tried to rescue me.
translation.it: Ha persino provato a mettermi in salvo.

translation.en: I'm guessing this means you don't want me to be your best man no more, huh?
translation.it: Suppongo che tu non mi voglia più come testimone.

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna make this real simple for you.
Hand over the other 50 grand... in that stupid ass' saddlebag,
translation.it: Datemi i 50.000 dollari che sono nella bisaccia su quello stupido ciuco

translation.en: or I put a bullet in her pretty Apache head.
translation.it: o pianterò una pallottola nella sua bella testolina apache.

translation.en: That ain't gonna happen.
Oh, it ain't?
No, sir.
Why's that?
Mmm... kind of a secret.
Well, you can tell your old man, can't ya?
translation.it: Al tuo vecchio puoi dirlo, no?

translation.en: You know that bag... -your boy's holding? -Uh-huh.
translation.it: Avete presente la bisaccia che il vostro uomo tiene in mano?

translation.en: It was meant for Cicero.
So there's something special in there.
-Plan B. -Plan B?
[garbled] Plan B.
Give me that bag.
Oh, shit!
[Tommy whispering] Where is she?
Smoking Fox.
Nighty-night, son.
-Danny, are you all right? -[groaning]
You done good, Daniel. You saved me.
translation.it: Sei stato bravo, Daniel. Mi hai salvato.

translation.en: It's my duty, Mr. President.
Mrs. Lincoln.
Come on! Come on! Come here.
[Frank] Get in.
I got one!
Clem, you almost shot me!
translation.it: Clem, per poco non mi colpivi!

translation.en: [man] Come on, get the horses!
My ass! My ass!
Is this here still valid, or is it too burnt up?
translation.it: È ancora valido o è troppo bruciacchiato?

translation.en: Let me take a look here.
Uh, that looks good to me. I mean, this looks good.
translation.it: A me sembra buono. Sembra valido.

translation.en: What in the hell?
You didn't scoop yours out, did you?
translation.it: Tu non ti sei cavato l'occhio, vero?

translation.en: What was the question again?
What?
Did any of you really do it?
translation.it: Qualcuno di voi l'ha fatto davvero?

translation.en: Well, then whose eyes are in that jar?
translation.it: E allora di chi sono quegli occhi nel barattolo?

translation.en: Well, Babyface found some rocks, and, uh, painted them.
translation.it: Babyface ha trovato dei sassi e li ha dipinti.

translation.en: Surprise?
[echoing] Hey, Tom, you wanna play a game
translation.it: Ehi, Tom, vuoi fare un gioco

translation.en: to make up for all the father-son time we missed?
translation.it: per recuperare un po' del tempo che abbiamo perso?

translation.en: Peek-a-boo.
[Frank] Hey, come over here!
No, come over there!
You could have had everything, son.
But you had to do the right thing.
translation.it: Ma hai dovuto fare per forza la cosa giusta.

translation.en: Let me leave you with a bit of fatherly advice.
translation.it: Lascia che ti dia un consiglio paterno.

translation.en: -Never bring a knife to a gunfight. -[gun cocking]
translation.it: Mai presentarsi a una sparatoria con un coltello.

translation.en: [Tommy] One day, there will be too many, my love.
translation.it: Prima o poi saranno in troppi, amore.

translation.en: [Smoking Fox] But not today.
That was some mystical shit.
translation.it: È stata una specie di magia.

translation.en: You knew Cicero killed my mother.
translation.it: Voi sapevate che Cicero aveva ucciso mia madre.

translation.en: No, I didn't know that.
No more lies!
Yeah, I knew. I knew.
Your mother insisted on telling.
translation.it: Tua madre era decisa a denunciarci.

translation.en: She was going to rat the whole gang out, and I tried to convince her--
translation.it: Voleva fare una soffiata sulla banda e provai a convincerla...

translation.en: Tommy, look, I'm your father, for God's sake.
translation.it: Tommy, ascoltami, sono tuo padre, per l'amor di Dio.

translation.en: You don't kill your father, Tommy.
translation.it: Non puoi uccidere tuo padre, Tommy.

translation.en: His name is White Knife.
translation.it: Il suo nome è Lama Bianca.

translation.en: I ain't gonna kill you.
'Cause my true father taught me otherwise.
translation.it: Perché il mio vero padre mi ha insegnato diversamente.

translation.en: You can't leave me like this!
You can't leave me here alone!
translation.it: Non puoi abbandonarmi qui da solo!

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Dear Mama, so much has changed since my last letter.
translation.it: Cara mamma, sono cambiate molte cose dalla mia lettera precedente.

translation.en: I scarcely know where to begin.
translation.it: Non so proprio da dove iniziare.

translation.en: First off, it turns out our daddy is a bad, bad man,
translation.it: Innanzitutto, papà si è rivelato un uomo molto, molto cattivo

translation.en: and he got thrown in jail.
But it's okay, 'cause Screaming Eagle, the Indian chief who raised Tommy,
translation.it: Ma va bene comunque perché Aquila Urlante, il capo indiano che ha cresciuto Tommy,

translation.en: said he'd be all our dads, too.
translation.it: ha detto che farà da papà anche a noi.

translation.en: I really like it here in this village.
translation.it: Mi piace molto stare in questo villaggio.

translation.en: Our new brothers and sisters love to have fun
translation.it: Ai nostri nuovi fratelli e sorelle piace divertirsi

translation.en: and have been so nice to all of us.
translation.it: e sono stati molto gentili con tutti noi.

translation.en: These white guys cannot dance.
translation.it: Questi bianchi non sanno proprio ballare.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Danny don't drink whiskey no more.
translation.it: Danny ha smesso di bere whisky.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] And Ramon and Herm are trying to learn Indian ways.
translation.it: E Ramon ed Herm stanno imparando le usanze indiane.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Oh, and big news...
I finally have a girlfriend,
and she's much prettier than a canty-loupe.
translation.it: ed è molto più carina di un melone.

translation.en: Come on, you two! You're missing all the fun.
translation.it: Venite, voi due! Vi state perdendo tutto il divertimento.

translation.en: Anyways, Mama, thanks for raising me.
translation.it: Ad ogni modo, mamma, grazie per avermi cresciuto.

translation.en: Your loving son, Lil Pete,
translation.it: Il tuo affezionato figlio, Mini Pete,

translation.en: proud member of the Ridiculous 6.
[Abner] Before you go...
Two, four, six, eight.
Who do we appreciate?
The Stockburns! The Stockburns!
Yeah! The Stockburns!
